mapper.insert:
SELECT REPORT_QUEUE_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
insert into SYS_REPORT_QUEUE_INFO(ID,OPENID,MOBILE,CARNUMBER,GMT_CREATE,DATA_STATUS,LATE_WEIGHT,LATE_TIMES,BIG_LADING_BILL_NO,LAST_CALLED_TIME,LOCATION,STOCKCODE) VALUES (#{id},#{openId},#{mobile},#{carNumber},#{gmtCreate},#{dataStatus},#{lateWeight},#{lateTimes},#{BigLadingBillNo},#{lastCalledTime,jdbcType=DATE},#{location},#{stockCode})
mapper.select: select c.ID as id, c.OPENID as openId from (select a.ID, a.OPENID, a.BIG_LADING_BILL_NO, a.DATA_STATUS, a.LATE_WEIGHT, a.GMT_CREATE, a.LOCATION, b.BILLNO from SYS_REPORT_QUEUE_INFO a left join (select DISTINCT BILLNO from print_affirm@sgps where trunc(printtime) = trunc(sysdate)) b on a.BIG_LADING_BILL_NO = b.BILLNO) c where c.BILLNO is null and c.LOCATION = #{location} order by c.LATE_WEIGHT,c.GMT_CREATE

select c.ID from (select a.ID, a.BIG_LADING_BILL_NO, a.DATA_STATUS, a.LATE_WEIGHT, a.GMT_CREATE, b.BILLNO from SYS_REPORT_QUEUE_INFO a left join (select DISTINCT BILLNO from print_affirm@sgps where trunc(printtime) = trunc(sysdate)) b on a.BIG_LADING_BILL_NO = b.BILLNO) c where c.BILLNO is null and c.DATA_STATUS = 1 order by c.LATE_WEIGHT,c.GMT_CREATE

select c.ID as no, c.CARNUMBER as carNum, c.GMT_CREATE as reportTime, c.LAST_CALLED_TIME as timeout, decode(c.DATA_STATUS, 1, 'printing', 0, 'waiting') as status, c.LOCATION as location from (select a.ID, a.CARNUMBER, a.GMT_CREATE, a.BIG_LADING_BILL_NO, a.LATE_WEIGHT, a.LAST_CALLED_TIME,a.DATA_STATUS, a.LOCATION, b.BILLNO from SYS_REPORT_QUEUE_INFO a left join (select DISTINCT BILLNO from print_affirm@sgps where trunc(printtime) = trunc(sysdate)) b on a.BIG_LADING_BILL_NO = b.BILLNO) c where c.BILLNO is null order by c.LATE_WEIGHT,c.GMT_CREATE

select gi.LOCATION as "location", a.STOCKCODE as "stockCode" from (select distinct STOCKCODE from sell.SJFORECASTTIME where substr(SJ,1,10) = #{timeStr} and BIG_LADING_BILL_NO = #{bigLadingBillNo}) a left join SYS_GARAGE_INFO gi on a.STOCKCODE = gi.GARAGENUM
